pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Pay per qualified click. Volume discounts included.
pricing.creatorSubtitle: We take a small commission on your earnings ‚Äî only when you get paid.
pricing.foundingWhatsapp: Private WhatsApp and daily contact with the Naano team

brands.a1: Naano is a B2B UGC marketplace that connects tech companies with vetted nano-creators (1‚Äì30k followers) to publish LinkedIn content that drives measurable traffic and leads.
brands.a2: Naano runs on monthly credits: 1 credit = 1 qualified click to your chosen link. You select a monthly credit pack, and you never pay more than your monthly quota.
brands.a3: To protect quality, Naano filters out bots and crawlers, deduplicates visits (one counted visit per IP), and applies a minimum time-on-page rule (e.g., 3 seconds). We also review abnormal click-to-impression ratios.
brands.q4: Can unused credits roll over? What if a post goes viral?
brands.a4: Unused credits automatically roll over to the next month. If a post generates clicks beyond your monthly credit quota, those extra clicks are free.
brands.a5: You can select creators based on profile, geography, and topics‚Äîor ask Naano to recommend and match the best creators for your campaign. We can also do creator selection together during onboarding.
brands.q6: How do you track performance and ROI?
brands.a6: You get a unified dashboard to monitor posts and results in real time (clicks, visits, leads, and revenue when applicable). You can also run retargeting and warm outbound on post interactions (likes, comments, shares) to improve conversion.

creators.q1: How do I earn money on Naano?
creators.a1: You earn ‚Ç¨0.90 per click generated on your promotional posts for partner companies. If you publish a promotional post for Naano during registration, you unlock a premium rate of ‚Ç¨1.10 per click, which is a 22% earnings boost on all your future clicks.
creators.a2: Without a business structure, you can withdraw between ‚Ç¨50 minimum and ‚Ç¨500 maximum, with a limit of 25 paid posts per year. With a registered business structure (sole trader, company), there are no limits on withdrawal amounts or number of paid posts, unlocking unlimited earning potential.
creators.q3: How does the credit system work?
creators.a3: 1 credit = 1 paid click. Each company purchases credits in advance representing their maximum budget. If a company has 500 available credits and you generate 600 clicks, you'll only be remunerated for 500 clicks. It's crucial to verify available credits before applying or publishing content.
creators.q4: Does my profile need to be validated by Naano before I start?
creators.a4: No, your profile is not validated by Naano. You can begin applying to companies immediately after registration, giving you instant access to collaboration opportunities.
creators.q5: What are the two main content formats to maximize clicks?
creators.a5: The Lead Magnet format (DM strategy) is the most effective: you publish a high-value post, offer a free company resource, invite your audience to comment a specific word, then send the tracked link via DM to each person who comments. The direct link format is simpler: you naturally integrate the link in your post or first comment with authentic analysis.
creators.q6: Am I free to choose what I post on Naano?
creators.a6: Yes, you are completely free on the platform. We provide a brief for informational purposes to help you understand the company's expectations, but there is no contractual commitment. You're free to post when you want, for the companies you want, and choose the content format that suits you best. You maintain full control over your collaborations and can select only companies aligned with your values and audience.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: The B2B UGC marketplace connecting tech companies with vetted nano-creators.
about.section1P1: Naano connects companies that want to grow with LinkedIn micro-creators who want to monetize their network.
about.section1P2: We believe growth works better when it's driven by people, not ads.
about.section1P3: That's why we help businesses scale through Creator-Led Growth: real professionals talking to real audiences.
about.section2P1: Make creator marketing your most effective revenue channel.
about.section2P2: We connect B2B companies with LinkedIn micro-creators who have strong credibility in their industry and can turn trust into growth.
about.section3P1: Naano wasn't built on theory. It was built on results.
about.section3P2: Before launching the platform, we tested this model with a video AI startup:
about.section3P3: Naano was created to make this success easy to repeat, at scale.
about.section4Brand1: Unlock new growth: Turn LinkedIn creators into your best sales channel
about.section4Brand2: Build brand authority: Get recommended by trusted voices in your industry
about.section4Brand3: Performance-pay only: Pay per click, not per post
about.section4Creator1: Your expertise is the asset: Your credibility matters more than your follower count
about.section4Creator2: Monetize what you already do: Get paid for recommending tools you actually use
about.section4Creator3: Earn from your network: Turn your LinkedIn posts into revenue
